description: This table stores invoice-level attachment information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INV_ATTACH_INV_NUM
columns.description: Invoice number for the related group.

columns.name: INV_ATTACH_ROI_ID
columns.description: The request for information record for the invoice.

columns.name: INV_ATTACHMENT_GENERATED_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if an attachment was generated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INV_ATTACH_EDITED_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if an attachment was edited.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INV_ATTACHMENT_GENERATED_YN

columns.name: INV_ATTACH_REMOVED_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if a user removed the attachment from a workqueue.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INV_ATTACHMENT_GENERATED_YN
